## IDevice.browserLabel property

Retrieves the full access label of the device. This is a stringified version of [IDevice.vendorId](./jabra-js.idevice.vendorid.md) and [IDevice.productId](./jabra-js.idevice.productid.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly browserLabel: string;
```
